arts.ttl: Super Simons: Spurs trounce Copenhagen in Champions League response to criticism
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur get back to winning ways with a 4-0 win in the Champions League against Copenhagen at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on Tuesday night.

arts.ttl: Tottenham 4-0 Copenhagen: Van de Ven stunner gives fans reason to smile
arts.sum: Tottenham snapped a four game losing streak at home against FC Copenhagen on Tuesday with a slick performance fans had been craving from Thomas Frank's side.

arts.ttl: Tottenham 4-0 Copenhagen: Micky van de Ven redeems himself for Thomas Frank snub - while one star's confidence comes rushing back in dazzling display for jubilant Spurs
arts.sum: MATT BARLOW: Just three days after refusing to applaud supporters and complaining about the boos, Micky van de Ven set about soothing Tottenham's wounds with an outrageous solo goal.

arts.ttl: What Djed Spence did immediately after Copenhagen win after blanking Thomas Frank on Saturday
Micky van de Ven leads Tottenham charge as Spurs blitz Copenhagen in statement win
arts.sum: TOTTENHAM 4-0 COPENHAGEN: Tottenham defender Micky van de Ven scored a memorable goal as he charged from his own box to slot home at the other end

arts.ttl: Van de Ven says sorry in style with solo stunner in Spurs thrashing of Copenhagen
arts.sum: Micky van de Ven scored a contender for one of the best Champions League goals as Tottenham thrashed Copenhagen in a much-needed 4-0 home victory.

arts.sum: Follow Daily Mail Sport's live blog for the latest scores and updates as Liverpool welcome Real Madrid to Anfield as Tottenham play host to Copenhagen at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.

arts.sum: So, I know of course Copenhagen is not in the best place, but it's a very good team. I still have good colleagues, friends working in different clubs, knowing obviously also a lot of people in Copenhagen .

arts.ttl: Thomas Frank offers major injury news on Tottenham's most important player vs. Copenhagen
